title: [角色|安全|聊天|娱乐|综合][完全汉化]NovaGuilds——一款更好的公会插件[1.7.4-1.9]
author: LK520
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 小析
replies.txt_content: /ng tool 获取公会的物品 是会长可以设置东西 刚刚进会的人就可以得到

replies.author: 吾是心手
replies.txt_content: 看起来很不错!

replies.author: simon3000
replies.txt_content: 被公会后门插件搞的精神怪怪的看着这类插件就感觉不好╮(╯▽╰)╭

类似的插件都比较占资源

而且。没有工会 所谓好朋友之间还经常我拿你的 你偷我的。

如果再集合一群人的话。。

偷盗事件肯定会经常发生。腐竹会头疼的。

关键是，你朋友偷了你，关腐竹什么事。

replies.txt_content: 为什么没有1.6版本。。

已经汉化完了，但是我这里没服务端，所以完全是根据文本汉化的。你拿去后再核对下吧。

2015-9-2 17:50 上传

replies.author: SmartMadio
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SmartMadio 于 2015-9-2 17:57 编辑 
LK520 发表于 2015-9-2 17:24
感谢感谢
如果有空的话，你还是写一下使用教程吧，不然具体的流程很多人容易搞错。
Vault is required!
BarAPI is required unless you turn it off in config!
HolographicDisplays is required unless you turn it off in config!复制代码
Vault是必须，BarAPI和HolographicDisplays是可选。修改下吧。

replies.author: 孩纸@加醋
replies.txt_content: 我承认这个工会插件比任何的工会插件吊！大触我们做碰友吧！{:10_514:}

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

类似的插件会导致一熊熊一窝的现象。

对于大型服务器，我认为是致命的·

LK520 发表于 2015-9-5 21:51
你装了其他插件了？
提示an error....是不是
还是某个插件被触发跟他冲突了？ ...
就是提示an error红字一行。

replies.author: MarcinWieczorek
replies.txt_content:
请翻译我的文章

Hello.

My name is Marcin Wieczorek and I am the author of NovaGuilds.
I don't know Chinese, so please translate my post.

First thing I want to say is that I don't allow people to distribute binary versions of my plugin, and you can read about it in README on github.
github . com / MarcinWieczorek / NovaGuilds

I'm happy to see how many servers from China use my plugin. I want to work with you guys, but I don't know the language. If somebody here knows English, please contact me via email (marcin@marcin.co).
I need to update my Chinese translation which is built into NovaGuilds. Also, this topic has been not updated for a while, and that's a shame. Please download latest versions and leave feedback!

Thanks

replies.author: MarcinWieczorek
replies.txt_content:
Thanks guys.
You can allow Chinese characters as guild name by changing 'stringcheck' options in config.yml.
This plugin works OK on 1.7 1.8 and 1.9.

Can I switch this forums to English somehow?
